name: Asuka 120% Excellent BURNING Fest
overview: Asuka 120% Excellent BURNING Fest. is a 2D versus fighting game. It is essentially an upgrade of Asuka 120% BURNING Fest. featuring more zoomed-in visuals thus bigger character sprites, new moves, as well as CD Red Book audio. This version also has adventure/visual novel elements in the story mode and the option to choose between three speed settings. The fighter roster and stages remain unchanged.
